body_style: font-family: Google sans, Calibri, Andale, Tahoma, Verdana, Arial;
header_style: color: #015668; margin-top: 10px; padding: 10px 5px 0px 5px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 18px; text-align: left;
logo_style: color: #015668; font-weight: 700; text-align: center; font-size: 24px; padding: 10px;
container_style: border-top-radius: 5px; width: 95%; border: 0.5px solid gray; margin: 5px 5px 5px 5px; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px lightgrey;
internal-img_style: margin-bottom: 5px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 100%;
section_title_style: color: #263f44; padding: 10px 5px 10px 5px; font-weight: 600; font-size: 20px; border-bottom: 1pt solid #ffd369;
